name: Lights Out (itch) (Evan Williams)
description:
Lights Out is a short casual 3D game made as part of a college project.

You play as a light bulb that has fallen from your fixture and you must use what remaining light you have to guide yourself back.

Do you have what it takes to traverse a kitchen while avoiding deadly obstacles and harrowing heights? Probably. But you will hopefully have fun doing it, which is all that matters.

Lights Out 0.1 - Leave some feedback and let me know what you would like to see changed!

=========================================================

  • Developed in Unity 3D
  • Models made in Blender
  • UI and Backgrounds made in Photoshop

Any feedback is much appreciated!

You can find more of my work on my website.

Feel free to get in touch if you want to give feedback or work together.
